law.catch_line: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Capital stock" includes both common and preferred stock of a commercial bank.
"Debt instrument" means any capital note, debenture, bond, or certificate of beneficial interest issued by a commercial bank.
"Inhabitants" means the population of a municipal area, as determined by the latest federal or State census.
"Nondepository trust company" means a trust company that is not insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.
"State bank" means an institution that is incorporated under the laws of this State as a bank.
"Trust company" means an institution that is incorporated under the laws of this State as a trust company.
